hintArr.forEach(updateHint);
choiceArr.forEach(updateChoice);
migrateHandlingFeeFields();

function updateDictionary(obj) {
    var dictionaryGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    dictionaryGr.addEncodedQuery(obj.query);
    dictionaryGr.query();
    while (dictionaryGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(dictionaryGr, obj.attribute);
}


function updateHint(hintObj) {
    var documenationGr = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
    documenationGr.addEncodedQuery(hintObj.query);
    documenationGr.query();
    while (documenationGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(documenationGr, hintObj.attribute);
}

function updateChoice(hintObj) {
    var documenationGr = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
    documenationGr.addEncodedQuery(hintObj.query);
    documenationGr.query();
    while (documenationGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(documenationGr, hintObj.attribute);
}

function migrateHandlingFeeFields() {
    var handlingFeeGr = new HandlingFee().getByQuery('active=true');
    while (handlingFeeGr.next()) {
        if (!gs.nil(handlingFeeGr.getValue('percentage_based_handling_fee')) &&
            handlingFeeGr.getValue('percentage_based_handling_fee') == true) {
            var payload = {};
            payload.percentage_based_handling_fee = handlingFeeGr.getValue('percentage_based_handling_fee');
            payload.percentage = handlingFeeGr.getValue('percentage');
			payload.product_type = 'handling_fee';
			payload.handling_fee = handlingFeeGr.getUniqueValue();
			payload.price_type = 'single_price';
			new ContractProduct().create(payload);
        }
    }
}]]></script>
